sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' export default function CartSection() { const [productData, setProductsData] = useState([]); const [localData, setLocalData] = useState([]) const getproductData = ()=>{ const localStorageData = localStorage.getItem("cartItem"); const parsedData = JSON.parse(localStorageData); setLocalData(parsedData) const productIds = []; parsedData.map((item)=>{ productIds.push(item.productId); }); // console.log(productIds) axios({ url: "http://localhost:3001/product/cartItem/", method: "post", data: productIds }).then((res)=>{ setProductsData(res.data) }).catch((err)=>{ console.log(err) }) } useEffect(()=>{ getproductData() },[]) return ( <>
Home Cart
{ productData.map((item,index)=>{ let prId = item._id return(

{item.name}

{item.categoryId.name}
{ localData.map((item,index)=>{ return( (item.productId===prId)? ( <>
{item.productId}
Add-ons List

Number Of Items : 1

):(
) ) }) }
) }) }
Have Coupons?
Total Price: Rs 566
Discount -Rs 566
Tax: Rs 566
Sub Total Price Rs 566
) }
